name: Spades - King of Spades Plus
description:
Spades - King of Spades is a free version of classic card game for iOS!

Features:
- play Spades online with your friends or random opponents
- single player mode against smart AI opponent, when you are offline
- six themed tables with awesome design
- win Spades rings and receive rewards
- complete quests, get special items, collect rewards for full item sets
- send wonderful gifts to your partners and opponents
- reach the highest level of mastery and become the real King of Spades
- win the tournaments and climb the leaderboard
- suicide, whiz and solo spades modes will be unlocked after Xmas
- take the bonus every few hours

Just download Spades - King of Spades and put on the crown of master.
